thread.title: Liberals Who Boycotted Ivanka’s Brand Just Got DEVASTATING News, Who’s Laughing Now?
thread.title_full: Liberals Who Boycotted Ivanka’s Brand Just Got DEVASTATING News, Who’s Laughing Now?

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Liberals Who Boycotted Ivanka’s Brand Just Got DEVASTATING News, Who’s Laughing Now?
text:
10:55pm   
You know how liberals thought it would be fun to boycott Ivanka Trump’s clothing line even though she’s basically a liberal and has no connection to her dad’s conservative policies? 
Very silly. 
Then, liberal media outlets started pretending that there was no connection between the boycott and the fashion line being pulled from shelves.   
They claimed that the brand was pulled because it wasn’t popular and wasn’t selling.   
Yeah, let’s see what they have to say about this…   Washington Examiner : 
Recent controversies surrounding Ivanka Trump’s eponymous clothing line appear to not have had a longterm negative effect on the brand. 
The women’s fashion line reportedly saw record sales despite calls to boycott the brand of President Trump’s daughter. 
“Since the beginning of February, they were some of the best performing weeks in the history of the brand,” Abigail Klem, the president of the Ivanka Trump brand, told Refinery29 .  2'); }); 
“For several different retailers Ivanka Trump was a top performer online, and in some of the categories it was the [brand’s] best performance ever.”   
I’d say the brand is pretty popular wouldn’t you?  3'); }); 
It looks like this liberal boycott just backfired in a BIG LEAGUE way.  4'); });
